Sentence.string: I found the picture you need.
I know this guy. There was a time when he often came here. I haven’t seen him for at least 3 months. Girls say that he found the true love.
Oooh yes ! He was one of our best clients. He could have made run our business alone at that time.
Do you remember when he used to visit the place ?
Yes, it was some years ago. I think he was just getting married. Poor lady ...
Thank you Géraldine. Do you have any other information for me ?
Unless you invite me for a tea, I don’t see anything.
I’ll think about it. Meanwhile, I have a case to solve. See you soon Géraldine.
